name: Hide and Secret Treasure of the Ages
description: The villain Jacques has stolen the Treasures of the Ages so he can harness their mystical powers in his evil plan to rule the world. You must help Will Scout and Anna Graham on their quest to defeat him and rescue the treasures!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 etc Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 118 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Worst and laziest made HOG I've ever played. The objects are just the same items over and over on different backgrounds with little or no list variation. Waste of money at any price. I usually enjoy the Hide and Secret series but this is awful.
